psw = #{psw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update user_tbl set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, psw = #{psw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_freeze = #{isFreeze,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from user_tbl where user_name = #{userName} and is_del=0 limit 0,1

select T1.id id,T1.user_name userName,T1.longitude,T1.latitude, T2.dlevel from user_tbl T1 left join company_tbl T2 on T1.id = T2.user_id where T1.user_type = #{userType} and T1.is_del=0
and T2.village_id =#{villageId}

select
from user_tbl T1 where is_del = '0' and user_type = 5 and longitude is null

select T1.user_id from (select user_id, name from company_tbl where name = #{companyName}) T1 left join user_tbl T2 on T1.user_id = T2.id
T2.is_del = 0
